seo.description: Discover the story of MadreMia, a tech and digital marketing agency focused on delivering innovative solutions for your business.

hero.text1: You don't need to be a technology expert,

items.heading: Converting Followers into Customers: Improving Strategies
items.description: Our client had created their brand and social media presence, but they needed to convert their audience into actual buyers. They felt that they had a lot of followers, but something was not right in the strategy to turn them into customers.

items.heading: Turning Climate Change Ideas into Technological Reality
items.description: A Colombian Start-up had a great idea about Climate Change and carbon footprint measurement. They had a team of experts and knew they could capitalize on all that information, but they needed a technological ally to materialize their idea.

items.heading: Urgent Modernization: Transforming Logistics and Sales
items.description: Our client had a major challenge with their logistics operation and sales force. Their channels were too traditional and they felt they were falling behind their competition. A technological leap was urgently needed. They were compelled to modernize.

items.heading: From Idea to Action in 3 Weeks
items.description: In New Jersey (USA), an entrepreneur was ready to take the next step with her project. She had completed her business model and administrative tasks. To start selling, the only thing missing was to bring her brand to life and create her own website.

items.heading: Cost-Effective Technological Optimization with AWS
items.description: A project focused on electronic device rental had been in operation for several years, but its technology was not optimal. After much planning and execution, we were able to centralize its infrastructure on Amazon Web Services in a functional and very cost-effective manner.

items.heading: Customized AI without Million Dollar Investment
items.description: The general manager of a major industrial company in Colombia was convinced that he needed Artificial Intelligence, but he couldn't make a million-dollar initial investment. He contacted us and we created his own Chat GPT, mainly fueled by his own databases.

us2.title: Our Story
us2.text1: The story is very simple. We are an agency created by three siblings over seven years ago. Today, we are a complementary team of professionals working remotely from various locations.
us2.text2: We understood long ago that individuals and businesses don't have to be technology experts to develop their projects. It is much smarter and cost-effective to ally with the right team.
